Last night, the House passed the Families First Coronavirus Response Act with my support. This bipartisan legislation will ensure free testing, give families financial certainty, expand telehealth services, and protect seniors with severe medical conditions.

As we head into the weekend, I want to remind everyone that this is a time for caution, NOT panic or partisanship. Our nation is the strongest in the world, and I know by working together, we will defeat this disease.

This afternoon, President Trump declared a National Emergency in order to provide critical funds and resources to combat the coronavirus. With this assistance, Minnesota will be better equipped to mitigate the spread of this disease and assist those who are most vulnerable.

If you haven't already, sign up for my newsletter to stay updated on what the federal government is doing to combat the coronavirus and tips on how to keep you and your family safe. https://t.co/rIdaoNGkfm
